data.title: Favorite Steven Zaillian Screenplay
data.meta_description:
Steven Zaillian of Armenian descent, has written scripts for 4 Oscar-nominated films and has had many interventions in different films without being accredited. He has confirmed that his writing style flows best when the director can communicate with him and lets him find a way to express it through the script. His scripts are usually quite long compared to the scripts of the average films,  that usually have 100 pages; his reach up to 300 pages. Which of these scripts written by Steven Zaillian is your favorite?

 Choose your favorite script from other writers John Logan (https://www.imdb.com/poll/THDgGm4dGrM/) Paul Schader (https://www.imdb.com/poll/9xwBmkzzvig/) Charlie Kauffman (https://m.imdb.com/poll/j6OfkAantNY/)

Discuss here (https://getsatisfaction.com/imdb/topics/poll-suggestion-favorite-steven-zaillian-screenplay?rfm=1&topic_submit=true)
data.text:
Steven Zaillian of Armenian descent, has written scripts for 4 Oscar-nominated films and has had many interventions in different films without being accredited. He has confirmed that his writing style flows best when the director can communicate with him and lets him find a way to express it through the script. His scripts are usually quite long compared to the scripts of the average films, that usually have 100 pages; his reach up to 300 pages.
